# 散点图

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## 基础散点图

```{r}
df <- data.frame(
  x = 1:100,
  y = rnorm(100) + 2 * (1:100)  # 生成具有线性关系的x和y数据
)

p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = x, y = y))+
    geom_point(color='red')
p
```

## 添加平滑曲线

R^2^ ,p值：f6c

```{r}
p <- p +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm",formula = "y~x",color="black",linewidth=.8)
p
```

## 添加表达式

```{r}
p + ggpmisc::stat_poly_eq(formula = y ~ x,
                 ggpmisc::use_label(c("eq", "adj.R2", "P")))

```
